module.name: ps_eventbus
module.description: Link your PrestaShop account to synchronize your shop's data to the partners you want . Don't uninstall this module if you are already using a service, as it will prevent it from working.
module.author: PrestaShop
module.confirmUninstall: This action will prevent immediately your PrestaShop services and Community services from working as they are using PrestaShop EventBus module for syncing.
